Review Name: Very Good Review Description: I have been using it for the last 4 months. Pros 1. Good design matches the bedroom 2. 4 directional sweeping of cool air 3. Somewhat silent operation 4. Energy efficient. Cons 1. Noise level is a bit high just opposite to what is claimed in the Ad. 2. Operation is not as intelligent as the Daikin 4 star AC also owned by me. 3. They should have provided deodorant feature on the AC. Sometimes we feel a foul smell. Overall, the AC was a good purchase and it has been working to my satisfaction. Definitely I recommend the product.
